title: Red Rising
author: Pierce Brown
summary: In a future society where social status is determined by color-coded castes, a lowly Red miner named Darrow infiltrates the ruling Gold caste to bring about revolution and overthrow the oppressive system.

title: Golden Son
author: Pierce Brown
summary: Darrow continues his quest for revolution and revenge against the Golds, but the stakes are higher than ever as he becomes embroiled in interstellar politics and a web of betrayal.

title: Morning Star
author: Pierce Brown
summary: As the war between the rebellious Reds and the ruling Golds reaches its climax, Darrow must face his greatest challenge yet and make the ultimate sacrifice for the cause.

title: Iron Gold
author: Pierce Brown
summary: Ten years after the events of Morning Star, a new generation of leaders must grapple with the aftermath of the revolution and navigate the complex political landscape of the newly-formed Solar Republic.

title: Dark Age
author: Pierce Brown
summary: The Solar Republic is in turmoil as old alliances fracture and new enemies emerge from the shadows. Amidst the chaos, Darrow and his allies must fight to keep the dream of a better future alive.

title: Lightbringer
author: Pierce Brown
summary: The sixth and final book in the Red Rising series, Lightbringer promises to bring the epic saga to its thrilling conclusion as Darrow faces his greatest challenge yet and the fate of the Solar Republic hangs in the balance.
